refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: xyzrefinedPoints = bundleAdjustment(_3dpoints, imagepoints, visibility, cameramatrix, rotation, translation, distcoeffs)

listitem.para: M * N * 2 image points for each camera and each points
M * N * 1 visibility matrix, element[i][j] = 1 when object point i is visible from camera j and 0 if not
M * 3 * 3 camera matrix(intrinsic parameters) 3 * 3 camera matrix for each image
M * 3 * 3 rotation matrix for each image
M * 3 * 1 translation matrix for each image
M * (4 * 5 * 8) * 1 distortion coefficient for each image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function returns the refined 3-D points. The refinement procedure uses Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: xyzrefinedPoints = bundleAdjustment(_3dpoints, imagepoints, visibility, cameramatrix, rotation, translation, distcoeffs)
